meta_description: The Museum of the White Mountains preserves and promotes the unique history, culture, and environment legacy of the region, as well as provides unique collections-based, archival, and learning resources serving researchers, students, and the public.
hours_text:
#  Plan a visit 

Plan a visit 

## 

Come see for yourself 

###  Plan your UNH visit 

The best way to know if UNH is right for you is to visit and see for yourself. Explore our beautiful campus, connect with current students, and experience first-hand what makes our community special and why you’ll feel at home here.

Visit campus 

## 

Let us show you around 

See what life as a Wildcat is really like! Your visit begins with a 30-minute info session, followed by a student-led tour of our scenic campus. Along the way, you’ll get insights into academics, community, and life in Durham. 

[ Schedule a tour  ](https://apply.unh.edu/portal/durham-visit-options)

Featured Events 

###  Join us on campus 

From Open Houses to Admitted Student Days, our featured events are designed to help you experience UNH at its best. Explore campus, meet future classmates, and see what it's like to be a Wildcat.

###  Fall Open House 

Experience UNH this fall. Explore majors, tour campus, visit residence halls, meet fellow students, and picture yourself as a Wildcat.

[ Fall Open House  ](https://admissions.unh.edu/visit-options/fall-open-house)

###  Prospective Student Visit Day 

Enjoy a smaller, more personal event with focused sessions, student panels, and tours to see if the campus feels like the right fit.

[ Prospective student visits  ](https://admissions.unh.edu/visit-options/prospective-student-visit-day)

###  Admitted student visits 

Once you’re admitted to UNH, get the full Wi...
admission_text:
#  Admissions & Aid 

Admissions 

Ready to become a Wildcat? 

“UNH scholarships made my education possible.”

SAM VOCE  
|  
CLASS OF 2025

[ Apply now  ](/admissions-aid/apply) [ Request info  ](/request-information) [ Visit campus  ](/admissions-aid/plan-visit)

###  Your admissions journey begins here 

Welcome to your future! We’re here to help you navigate admissions, understand affordability, and see the real value of a UNH education. Let's take the first step together.

### [ 11.3K+  Undergraduates from all over the world  Information for International students  ](https://www.unh.edu/global/international-students-scholars/international-students-scholars/students/international-admissions-aid) ### [ 2.5K  Graduate students enrolled in over 100 programs  Explore graduate school  ](https://gradschool.unh.edu/) ### [ 3  Campuses, plus online  Explore campuses  ](/life-unh/explore-campuses) ### [ 95%  First-time, full-time students receive aid  Explore access & affordability  ](/admissions-aid/access-affordability)

Admissions process 

###  Your admissions roadmap 

Curious about becoming a Wildcat? No matter what your path looks like, we've made applying to UNH approachable and straightforward, with clear steps, helpful resources, and support at every stage, so that you can explore with ease.

###  Undergraduate admissions 

From application deadlines to required materials, our undergraduate admissions team makes it simple to follow each step and stay on track.

Museum of the White Mountains

## Exhibitions

November 12 - December 31

[Learn More](https://www.plymouth.edu/mwm/event/2025/11/rooted-story-trees "Rooted: A Story of Trees")

## Events

## Collection Highlights

* * *

The Museum of the White Mountains preserves and promotes the unique history, culture, and environment legacy of the region, as well as provides unique collections-based, archival, and learning resources serving researchers, students, and the public.

**Dan Noel Collection**

[**Dan Noel Collection**](/mwm/collections/guide-daniel-noel-white-mountain-collection "Guide to the Daniel Noel White Mountain Collection")

**John "Jack" And Anne Newton Collection**

[**John "Jack" And Anne Newton Collection**](/mwm/collections/guide-john-w-anne-h-newton-white-mountains-collection "Guide to the John W. and Anne H. Newton White Mountains Collection")

**Frances "Dolly" MacIntyre Collection**

[**Frances "Dolly" MacIntyre Collection**](http://digitalcollections.plymouth.edu/cdm/search/field/proven/searchterm/MacIntyre/mode/exact)

**English Collection**

[**English Collection**](http://digitalcollections.plymouth.edu/cdm/search/field/proven/searchterm/English%20Jr.,%20Ben/mode/exact)
